item.name: Edit soil layer properties for soil

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () {

body.raw:
{
  "layerSourceType": {
    "description": "Composite",
    "id": 2
  },
  "layers": [
    {
      
      "soilZone": {{soilZoneId}},
      "fromDepth": 0,
      "sourceType": {
        "id": 3,
        "description": "Manual",
        "objectNature": "SourceType"
      },
      "soilTexture": {
        "id": 5,
        "description": "SiltLoam",
        "additionals": {
          "clay": 0.180107336956522,
          "density": 1,
          "gravels": 0,
          "organic_matter": 3.04524923913043,
          "salinity": 0,
          "sand": 0.150389945652174
        }
      },
      "wiltingPoint": 9,
      "fcPoint": 21,
      "awc": 0.2,
      "saturationPoint": 41.7,
      "hydraulicConductivity": null,
      "sandComposite": 40,
      "siltComposite": 40,
      "clayComposite": 20,
      "organicMatter": null,
      "chalk": null,
      "gypsum": null,
      "sodiumAdsorbtionRatio": null,
      "ec": null,
      "cationExchangeCapacity": null,
      "ph": null,
      "activeLayer": true,
      "sturationPoint": 41.74,
      "objectNature": "ZoneSoilLayer",
      "isValid": true,
      "isChanged": false,
      "isEditable": false
    },
    {
      "fromDepth": 10,
      "fcPoint": null,
      "wiltingPoint": null,
      "clayComposite": 25,
      "sandComposite": 25,
      "siltComposite": 50,
      "organicMatter": null,
      "isValid": true,
      "isEditable": true,
      "isChanged": true
    }
  ]
}
